media:group.media:title: Pashinyan says Azerbaijani trying to โlegitimize future warsโ
media:group.media:description:
๐Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan says โrecent statements from Baku are a serious blow to the peace process,โ and offers to sign an arms control agreement as a step towards peace. ๐The next meeting of the Azerbaijan and Armenia border demarcation commissions will meet in late January to lay out relevant documents and maps for use in the process, with a focus on the Tavush region's border. ๐The Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors unanimously passes a motion urging the Biden administration to impose sanctions on Azerbaijani leadership and to suspend all military and economic aid to it over the illegal holding of Armenian prisoners. ๐A brief history of the Armenian community in Estonia: https://www.civilnet.am/en/news/761742/armenians-in-tallinn-the-birth-of-a-community/
